metadata.name: Rebuilding from the ruins
metadata.description:
Despite the ruins that surround us,  
We hold on to the hope within,  
For we know that the soul is indomitable,  
It cannot be broken or worn thin.

We may have faced trials and tribulations,  
But we have come out stronger in the end,  
For the soul is a force of resilience,  
It knows how to bend, but not to bend.

So let us not get discouraged,  
By the ruins that lay before us,  
For we have the strength and courage,  
To rise up and rebuild, and to not make a fuss.

We have the power to create,  
A future filled with hope and light,  
A future that is truly great.  
So let us embrace the hope within,  
And let it guide us on our way,  
For the soul is a beacon of hope,  
That will lead us through the night and day.
